glsa.title: MPFR: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: Multiple buffer overflows in MPFR might lead to a Denial of Service.

background.p: MPFR is a library for multiple-precision floating-point computations with exact rounding.

description.p: Multiple buffer overflows have been reported in the mpfr_snprintf() and mpfr_vsnprintf() functions.

impact.p: A remote user could exploit the vulnerability to cause a Denial of Service in an application using MPFR via unknown vectors.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All MPRF users should upgrade to the latest version:
